title: Angelic Deals
description: Desperate times, desperate deals.The bane of my existence, a.k.a. Zel, wants me to find the Red Angel—a.k.a. my secret identity.The angel Gabriel wants me to find a summoner…and figure out how to kill them and free their angelic summon.The summoners want more weapons, possibly for world domination.And I just want to keep my secrets and try to pay rent. Is it too much to ask?Apparently. But if I play my cards right, not only will I get my life back in order, but I’ll end up with a few angelic favors in my pocket. Talk about improving my rock-bottom standing in the magical community! I better bring my A-game, though, because when you’re talking angels, deals that sound too good to be true…Always are.Delve into the action-packed Urban Fantasy world of the Realms, featuring a down-on-her-luck, determined heroine, angels, demons, mayhem, and a slow-burn romance.
author: Isa Medina
